name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCIndia: From using a loudspeaker to going around on a motorbike, some teachers have found alternative ways to teach their students. 

While India has allowed schools to partially reopen, many states are reluctant to do so due to rapidly rising Covid-19 cases.
